title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

requestBody.title: Verify UC-specific analytics and KPI outcome Snapshot

view.title: Verify UC-specific analytics and KPI outcome
view.subtitle: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.

blocks.title: Owner Verify Uc Analytics Outcome completed
blocks.message: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.

resultPayload.note: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.

data.title: Verify UC-specific analytics and KPI outcome Snapshot

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Equipment Sharing Pool. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.title: Create resources representing hosts/assets/venues Snapshot
